title: Catppuccin Mocha
author: catppuccin
description: A warm and cozy SketchyBar configuration using the beloved Catppuccin Mocha palette. Features a soothing pastel color scheme that's easy on the eyes during long coding sessions. Includes workspace indicators, system stats, and media controls.

dotfiles.sketchybarrc:
#!/bin/bash

CONFIG_DIR="$HOME/.config/sketchybar"
PLUGIN_DIR="$CONFIG_DIR/plugins"

source "$CONFIG_DIR/colors.sh"

# Bar configuration
sketchybar --bar height=32 \
                 color=$BASE \
                 shadow=on \
                 position=top \
                 sticky=on \
                 padding_right=10 \
                 padding_left=10 \
                 corner_radius=9 \
                 y_offset=5 \
                 margin=10 \
                 blur_radius=20

# Default values
sketchybar --default icon.font="SF Pro:Bold:14.0" \
                     icon.color=$TEXT \
                     label.font="SF Pro:Bold:14.0" \
                     label.color=$TEXT \
                     background.color=$SURFACE0 \
                     background.corner_radius=5 \
                     background.height=24 \
                     padding_left=5 \
                     padding_right=5 \
                     label.padding_left=4 \
                     label.padding_right=4 \
                     icon.padding_left=4 \
                     icon.padding_right=4

# Left items
source "$CONFIG_DIR/items/apple.sh"
source "$CONFIG_DIR/items/spaces.sh"
source "$CONFIG_DIR/items/front_app.sh"

# Right items
source "$CONFIG_DIR/items/calendar.sh"
source "$CONFIG_DIR/items/battery.sh"
source "$CONFIG_DIR/items/cpu.sh"

sketchybar --update
dotfiles.colors.sh:
#!/bin/bash

# Catppuccin Mocha
export BASE=0xff1e1e2e
export MANTLE=0xff181825
export CRUST=0xff11111b

export TEXT=0xffcdd6f4
export SUBTEXT0=0xffa6adc8
export SUBTEXT1=0xffbac2de

export SURFACE0=0xff313244
export SURFACE1=0xff45475a
export SURFACE2=0xff585b70

export OVERLAY0=0xff6c7086
export OVERLAY1=0xff7f849c
export OVERLAY2=0xff9399b2

export BLUE=0xff89b4fa
export LAVENDER=0xffb4befe
export SAPPHIRE=0xff74c7ec
export SKY=0xff89dceb
export TEAL=0xff94e2d5
export GREEN=0xffa6e3a1
export YELLOW=0xfff9e2af
export PEACH=0xfffab387
export MAROON=0xffeba0ac
export RED=0xfff38ba8
export MAUVE=0xffcba6f7
export PINK=0xfff5c2e7
export FLAMINGO=0xfff2cdcd
export ROSEWATER=0xfff5e0dc
dotfiles.items/apple.sh:
#!/bin/bash

sketchybar --add item apple.logo left \
           --set apple.logo icon="" \
                            icon.color=$MAUVE \
                            icon.font="SF Pro:Bold:16.0" \
                            background.color=$SURFACE0 \
                            label.drawing=off \
                            click_script="sketchybar --update"
